text:
Hello does anyone know if the import support ";" delimiter for Associated Contact IDs?

Use case that I have, I do an export of a company that have 2 contacts associated. When I import that back into HubSpot the Associated Contact IDs I map with Contact/Record id where automatically is complaining because of the delimiter.

JSON structure:
```Company Record ID,Account email,Team name,unique_team_id,Associated Contact IDs
22140726428,jason@**.co.uk,Name team,1283216,
22140933044,greenseedherbals@**.com,* team,1282880,43945606914
22141137170,**@gmail.com,* * team,1278600,43953680458; 43954757477```
